item.description:
Our Monthly Hypnosis/NLP Meetup in Methuen. Learn/Experience/Share techniques and strategies to help yourself or others overcome fears, phobias, negative emotions, illnesses, and many others, as well as to become the person you always wanted to be.
Specific Topic: Phobias, Fears, and Allergies

This meeting's theme is on NLP strategies and techniques for taking care of Phobias, Fears, and Allergies.  We will discuss the similarities of fears, phobias, and allergies and the different strategeis to rid them.  I will demonstrate NLPs fast phobia cure and allergy cure and possibly the effect of EFT on a fear or Phobia.  I will do as many individual demos as time permits.

Bring friends that you know may be able to be helped.

Kevin Martin
978-273-5905
kenda_assoc@msn.com
www.poseffects.com

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston NLP Meetup - Methuen - Phobias, Fears, and Allergies
